test_cases.name: DRPP-GP-15 FXP timeout in transfer process

meta.info:
Objective: Validate FXP timeout handling across interscheme combinations 

 Expected Result: Timeout error in FXP response without impacting DFSP positions

requests.description: Accept FX Conversion Quote and send POST /quotes

test_cases.name: DRPP-GP-16 FXP processing errors in transfer process

meta.info:
Objective: Validate FXP processing error handling across interscheme combinations 

 Expected Result: Processing error in FXP response without impacting DFSP positions

requests.description: Accept FX Conversion Quote and send POST /quotes

assertions.description: Error description should contain error message

test_cases.name: DRPP-GP-17 FXP sends ABORTED state in transfer process

meta.info:
Objective: Validate FXP service ABORTED state response across interscheme combinations 

 Expected Result: ABORTED state in FXP response without impacting DFSP positions

requests.description: Accept FX Conversion Quote and send POST /quotes

assertions.description: Error description should contain Generic FXP rejection message

 Expected Result: Timeout error in transfer service response without impacting DFSP positions
